name: Recall Chess
description:
A chess variation inspired by the movie Memento (2000) by Christopher Nolan.

A game of chess has been played, but you suffer from short-term memory loss and can't remember the board positions. You'll have to play the game backwards! You have 10 moves to make before you get returned to a previous board state 20 moves ago.

The bot you'll be playing against is very mediocre. The real enemy is time.
